title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.6 - Broker's sale of property in which he owns an interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.6 - Broker's sale of property in which he owns an interest

State Regulations

Before a real estate broker sells property in which he owns
an interest, he shall make such interest known to the
purchaser. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
